attributes.action: Turn young criminals into the artizans of their own  future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Suggestion dealing with young criminals in particular,
Down to earth, pracitcal and gauranteed to be extremely popular.
Secure establishments dedicated to turning out qualified Plumbers, Electricians, plasterers, etc.  Early release only for those that put in the effort to qualify (carrot) those that disrupt and show no willingness to learn, transfered to standard prisons to serve FULL sentence (stick).  Linked to this, housing needs.  Initiate a modern equivilent to the Prefab scheme post WW2, this would give released prisoners  definate and worthwhile employment on release, those that comply added to list as potential owner / tennants of the accomdation they create.
Two major public concerns addressed right away, could be started very quickly, positive results if organized sensibly, certain vote winner.
Test the water with a pilot scheme  before it is hijacked by someone looking for political ammunition.
